title: Israel Gives Itself More Control Over Occupied West Bank
summary_full: The security cabinet took actions that make it easier for Jews to buy land in the territory. Critics say the changes violate the Oslo Accords and international law and accelerate attempts to annex the land.
summary_public: The security cabinet took actions that make it easier for Jews to buy land in the territory. Critics say the changes violate the Oslo Accords and international law and accelerate attempts to annex the land.

IL.label: negative
IL.evidence: Critics say the changes violate the Oslo Accords and international law
